solutionName: Major Incident Management Using MS Teams
solutionUrlTitle: Major Incident Management Using MS Teams

metadata.solutionTechnologies: Azure;Azure Cosmos DB;Azure Web App Service;Power App;Power Automate

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content:
Incident managers are using disconnected systems to manage Major incidents which is causing cluttered experience in orchestrating major incidents.

Major incident is being handled by existing disconnected capabilities like desk phone system, manual creation of teams and channels for every major incident, document management systems and manual sync of incident logs to incident management system after resolution.

This solution addresses the gap in collaboration, communication and related asset management during Major Incident Management.

This automated solution eliminates manual processes and provides an integrated major incident management using Microsoft Teams capabilities.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content:
This solution automates Incident notification in MS Teams, provides a unified platform to orchestrate and manage Major incidents on Microsoft Teams platform, using Microsoft Teams platforms out of the box capabilities for Collaboration and communication.

Incident managers can create work streams, update and close the incidents from Teams. Solution takes care of search and syncing the data with incident management system.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Success factors
content:
Incident managers and work stream stakeholders can effectively use Microsoft Teams collaboration capabilities like “Meet Now”, Message extensions to search incidents, Adaptive cards based notifications, BOTs based on Azure BOT framework and Power Platform for process automation.

Using Microsoft Teams as application development and delivery platform helped in construction of this solution and reduced the over application switching during the incident management process.
